_comment_1: Quiz configuration (JSON valid). Lines starting with _comment are ignored by the app and exist only as documentation.
_comment_2: quizId: unique ID for statistics in localStorage. Keep it stable once students start practicing.
_comment_3: renderer: quiz type. 'text' = free text input per question (Arabic shown, student types Hebrew).
_comment_4: numQuestions: how many questions to draw each run (without duplicates).
_comment_5: selectionWeights: base priority by strength class. Higher = appears more often.
_comment_6: new = never asked (total==0), weak/medium/strong are decided by accuracy thresholds below.
_comment_8: accuracy < weakThreshold => weak; accuracy < mediumThreshold => medium; else => strong.
_comment_9: noveltyK: boosts questions asked fewer times (noveltyBoost = 1/(1+total)).
_comment_10: priority = baseWeight * (1 + noveltyK * noveltyBoost). Typical range 0..3.
_comment_11: minNewRatio: optional (0..1). Ensures at least this fraction of questions are NEW if available.
_comment_12: preventSameGroup: avoid choosing two variants of the same word (e.g., w001a/w001b or w001.a/w001.b) in the same quiz run.
_comment_13: tags: optional filter; if include non-empty => only questions that contain at least one of those tags. exclude always removes.
